Changeling-So what happened

SageFirestorm-our friend archangel wanted an attack but the 
inhabitants found out before any of us could do heavy damage to it

Changeling-Thats slag,wait somethings weird

S.Firestorm-What is it

Changeling-well ((audjusts optic lenses to the forest on heat)) im 
picking up 2 heat signatures,both in the outlines of rats and the big 
1 is carrying the small 1 on the shoulder

S.Firestorm-a mouse bot and earthly mammal

Changeling-Ill see if i can find out what that mouse is doing
((switches off heat optics)) you fly a few feet behind and if the bot 
attacks then neutralize them

::they fly down in sepreate directions to see what this mouse bot 
wants,sagefirestorm lands and shifts into beast mode while changeling 
lands and turns off his jet pack approaching the mouse bot::

Changeling-grettings,i am changeling,can i help you out,you are 
wandering around towards the ark if you did not know

::he waits for the mouse to anwser::
